abstract_ssm: The Irwin Lutzky collection includes three certificates pertaining to Lutzky's childhood innoculations; miscellaneous publications, invitations, and programs belonging to Lutzky from such organizations as the Town of Flatbush Civic and Cultural Association and the Flatbush Historical Society; three photographs of Lutzky at Coney Island in 1944; and other miscellaneous materials relating to Brooklyn, N.Y. in the 1970s.
